page.title: 14SHOPPING IN FORT AUGUSTUS(2)
page.content:
Close to the A82,which crosses the{ {Caledonian Canal}near the centre of the village there are three more shops.Of the two on the south side of the canal,one sells souvenirs and the other tartan goods and souvenirs.The one on the north side is attached to a filling station.It sells fancy goods,souvenirs and confectionary.the only other shop in{Fort Augustus}is a souvenir and gift shop attached to{ the{Benedictine}monastery and run by the monks.For any other shopping people have to travel over 50km.to either{Fort William} or{Inverness.} Most locals think a baker's shop is needed in the area. In local shops around 20 assistants are employed,but some jobs are only seasonal.
.
